headline: American Eagle, Marvell, Softbank: Trending stocks
summary: High-street retailers American Eagle (AEO) and Zara owner Inditex see shares surge on earnings beats. Boeing (BA) rival Airbus (AIR.PA) rebounds after a selloff caused by a string of aircraft issues this week. Marvell (MRVL), Softbank (9984.T) and Crowdstrike (CRWD) are some of the tech stocks making big moves this morning - Ramzan Karmali tells you why. For more live coverage of the markets, watch the full episode of Market Sunrise and visit Yahoo Finance.

headline: Airbus Cuts Its Delivery Outlook. Why the Stock Is Up.
summary: FEATURE  Building airplanes hasn’t been easy lately.  On Wednesday, Boeing peer Airbus cut its full-year delivery forecast by 30 planes. It now expects to deliver about 790 jets in 2025, down from prior guidance, given in October, for 820 jets.

headline: US Stock Market Today: S&P 500 Futures Edge Higher on Building Fed Cut Bets
summary: The Morning Bull - US Market Morning Update Wednesday, Dec, 3 2025 US stock futures are pointing modestly higher this morning, helped by growing bets that the Federal Reserve will cut its key interest rate by a quarter of a percentage point as soon as next week. That would be the first step toward cheaper borrowing costs, which matter for everything from credit card bills to mortgage rates. At the same time, a global watchdog now expects US economic growth to cool to roughly 2 percent over...
